github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: All Terraform variables must have a description and an explicit type constraint (avoid 'any').
All Terraform outputs must have a description.
Commit messages must follow Conventional Commits: <type>(<scope>): <subject>. Allowed types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, build, ci, chore, revert.
